idea-plugin.name: Mario Progress Bar
idea-plugin.description:
This is the Mario Progress Bar for IJ based IDEs based on the Nyan Progress Bar by Dmitry Batkovitch. It display Mario with some bricks for the basic bar and a Koopa Shell for the indeterminate one.
